album.page_title: To You in a Distant Place Whose Name I Don't Know - About Album
album.page_desc: 2024 Album Project of Gangjeong Peace Music Camp. A musical journey of 12 songs ending war and singing for peace.
album.keywords: To You in a Distant Place Whose Name I Don't Know, Gangjeong Peace Music Camp, Album, Peace Music
album.hero_subtitle: A letter of peace sent from a world full of war and violence. The waves of music launched from Gangjeong Village by 12 teams of musicians.
album.meaning_desc: 'To You in a Distant Place Whose Name I Don't Know' is a message of solidarity sent to those suffering in conflict zones around the world. Ukraine, Gaza, and the Korean Peninsula. We don't know each other's faces or names, but our hearts wishing for peace while living in the same era are connected as one.
album.voices_desc: Rock, folk, jazz, electronic. 12 teams of musicians who empathize with the peace movement in Gangjeong Village translated peace in their own musical language. This album, created by various genres, proves that diversity is the essence of peace.
album.concert_subtitle: Check out all the records of the concerts held in Gangjeong and Seoul to commemorate the album release.
album.album_title_full: To You in a Distant Place Whose Name I Don't Know
album.musicians_page_title: Participating Musicians - To You in a Distant Place Whose Name I Don't Know
album.musicians_page_desc: 12 teams of musicians who participated in the Gangjeong Peace Music Camp album project. Artists singing for peace such as Caru, Kim Dong-san, Nam-su, and Saturday even on Monday.
album.musicians_page_keywords: Participating Musicians, Album Participation, Peace Musicians, Gangjeong Peace Music Camp, Artist

items.q: What kind of event is Gangjeong Peace Music Camp?
items.a: Gangjeong Peace Music Camp is a musical project for peace that started in Gangjeong Village, Jeju. It is an anti-war peace music festival where musicians of various genres gather to sing and demonstrate solidarity for peace in conflict regions around the world.

items.q: When will Gangjeong Peace Music Camp be held?
items.a: The 3rd Gangjeong Peace Music Camp is scheduled to be held for 3 days from June 5 (Fri) to June 7 (Sun), 2026.

items.q: Where will Gangjeong Peace Music Camp be held?
items.a: It will be held at Gangjeong Sports Park and throughout Gangjeong Village, located in Gangjeong Village, Seogwipo-si, Jeju Special Self-Governing Province.

Musicians from various genres such as rock, folk, jazz, and electronic will participate. In the 2026 camp, about 50-60 teams are expected to perform, and currently 32 teams have been confirmed. Past participating musicians include Solga, Gangjeong Choir, etc.
Gangjeong Peace Music Camp aims for an open festival that anyone who loves peace can enjoy for free. However, voluntary donations and goods sales will be held for the sustainability of the event.

items.q: What is the 'To You in a Distant Place Whose Name I Don't Know' project?
items.a: 'To You in a Distant Place Whose Name I Don't Know' is the name of the 2024 omnibus album project of Gangjeong Peace Music Camp. It contains 12 songs with messages of solidarity for those suffering from war in places like Ukraine and Palestine.
